items.title: Boeing: Trade War Hurts 737 MAX In China
items.description: Boeing continues to eye 737 MAX deliveries to China, but tariffs pose significant risks. Click here to find out why BA stock is a Buy.

items.title: Northrop's Arm Wins Contract to Support E-2C & D Hawkeye Jets
items.description: NOC secures a $24.1 million modification contract to provide continued sustainment and technical support for the E-2C and E-2D aircraft as well as common and unique requirements.
